osvSchema.details: Reflected Cross Site Scripting (XSS) vulnerability in RageFrame2 v2.6.43, allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary web scripts or HTML and obtain sensitive information via a crafted payload injected into the boxId parameter in the image cropping function.

description_data.value: Reflected Cross Site Scripting (XSS) vulnerability in RageFrame2 v2.6.43, allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary web scripts or HTML and obtain sensitive information via a crafted payload injected into the boxId parameter in the image cropping function.

descriptions.value: Reflected Cross Site Scripting (XSS) vulnerability in RageFrame2 v2.6.43, allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary web scripts or HTML and obtain sensitive information via a crafted payload injected into the boxId parameter in the image cropping function.

Vulnerabilidad de cross-site scripting (XSS) reflejado en RageFrame2 v2.6.43, permite a atacantes remotos ejecutar scripts web o HTML arbitrario y obtener información confidencial a través de un payload manipulado inyectado en el parámetro boxId en la función de recorte de imágenes.
